site.name: A & S Distributors
site.title: A & S Distributors - Fa'atau Mea'ai o le Pasefika
site.description: O lau fa'alagolago mo mea'ai moni o le Pasefika mai Fiti, Niu Sila ma Ausetalia. Matou te tu'uina atu i faleaiga, fa'atau oloa, ma fa'atau mea'ai oloa lelei i tau taugofie.
site.tagline: Aumai le Pasefika i lau Laulau
site.keywords: mea'ai Pasefika, fa'atau mea'ai Fiti, mamoe Niu Sila, povi kone, oloa niu, mea'ai Pasefika fa'atau tele, mea'ai Samoa, mea'ai Toga

hero.title: A & S Distributors
hero.subtitle: Fa'atau Mea'ai o le Pasefika
hero.description: Mea'ai moni o le Pasefika mai Fiti, Niu Sila ma Ausetalia. Tautuaina Kalefonia i Matu talu mai le 1995.

intro.title: Pisinisi Aiga, Musumusuga Pasefika
intro.p1: O le A & S Distributors o se pisinisi aiga e fa'amoemoe i le tautuaina o la matou aiga o tagata fa'atau e fa'alagolago mai ia matou mo mea'ai maualuga mai Fiti, Niu Sila ma Ausetalia. O matou o le Fa'atau o le Itu i Matu o Kalefonia mo The New Zealand Lamb Company ma o lo matou lava fale USDA mo le tipi o mamoe ma 'oti uma. Matou te ave mai le tele o mea'ai fa'apitoa o le Pasefika e susu, fa'amalo ma mago i tau taugofie.
intro.p2: I le A & S Distributors matou te taumafai mo le lelei sili e ala i le fausia o so'otaga tumau ma a matou tagata fa'atau e ala i lo matou fa'amoemoe i le fa'amaoni ma le fa'aaloalo. Matou te tu'uina atu i fale oloa oloa lelei e fa'aaoga e o latou tagata fa'atau e fai ai mea'ai manaia mo o latou aiga.
intro.p3: Matou te taumafai e tu'uina atu se tulaga o auaunaga e le gata e avatu oloa e mana'omia e a matou tagata fa'atau ae fa'apea fo'i le fa'amautu o le sa'o o au fa'atonuga. O le alu i le "maila fa'aopoopo" o le mea lea e ese ai le A & S Distributors mai o matou tagata fa'atau. Matou te fa'atalitali i le galulue fa'atasi ma oe.

values.title: O C e Fa o le Auaunaga Tagata Fa'atau
values.subtitle: O a matou ta'iala talu mai le aso muamua

concern.title: Popole
concern.description: Popole o lo o ia matou mo a matou tagata fa'atau ma tagata faigaluega.

confidence.title: Fa'atuatua
confidence.description: Fa'atuatua e matou avatu i a matou tagata fa'atau mea'ai maualuga sili mai le Pasefika.

commitment.title: Fa'amoemoe
commitment.description: Fa'amoemoe e tu'uina atu le mea sili i a matou tagata fa'atau ma le fa'amaoni ma le fa'aaloalo.

convenience.title: Faigofie
convenience.description: Tu'uina atu le ituaiga auaunaga e iloa ai e a matou tagata fa'atau le taua o i latou ia matou.

catalog.title: A Matou Oloa
catalog.description: Su'e mai a matou mea'ai moni o le Pasefika

search.noResults: E leai ni oloa e fetaui ma lau su'esu'ega.

catalog.seoDescription: Su'e mai a matou oloa moni o le Pasefika e aofia ai povi kone, mamoe, oloa niu, ma isi. Tau fa'atau tele mo faleaiga ma fa'atau oloa.
catalog.seoKeywords: lisi mea'ai Pasefika, oloa mea'ai Fiti, povi kone fa'atau tele, mamoe Niu Sila, mea'ai Pasefika fa'atau tele

quote.title: Talosaga Tau
quote.emptyDescription: Fa'aopoopo oloa mai la matou lisi e talosaga ai se tau.
quote.itemCount: {count, plural, =0 {E leai ni oloa} =1 {1 oloa} other {# oloa}}

submitPage.title: Auina Talosaga Tau
submitPage.seoDescription: Auina se talosaga tau mo mea'ai moni o le Pasefika. Tau fa'atau tele mo faleaiga, fa'atau oloa, ma tagata tu'uina atu mea'ai. Tali vave mai la matou 'au fa'atau.
submitPage.seoKeywords: tau fa'atau tele, mea'ai Pasefika fa'atau tele, fa'atau mea'ai Fiti, fa'atonuga tele, oloa faleaiga
submitPage.name: Igoa Atoa
submitPage.agreeToContact: Ou te ioe e fa'afeso'ota'i a'u e se sui fa'atau e uiga i lenei talosaga tau.
submitPage.errorMessage: Na iai se mea na tupu. Fa'amolemole toe taumafai mulimuli ane.
submitPage.requiredFields: Fa'amolemole fa'atumu uma vaega e auina lou talosaga tau. O la matou 'au fa'atau o le a fa'afeso'ota'i oe vave.

validation.phoneInvalid: Fa'amolemole tu'u se numera telefoni sa'o

sales.title: Mana'omia Fesoasoani?
sales.description: O la matou 'au fa'atau o lo o iai e fesoasoani ia te oe i fa'atonuga ma fesili.

footer.description: Mea'ai moni o le Pasefika mai Fiti, Niu Sila ma Ausetalia.
footer.copyright: A & S Distributors. Aia uma e fa'asaoina.

corned-beef.title: Povi Kone - Aano Tini Maualuga | A & S Distributors
corned-beef.description: Povi kone ma mamoe maualuga mai Ausetalia. O Ox & Palm, Pacific, Colonial, Globe ma Crown e maua i lapopo'a eseese.
corned-beef.pageDescription: Povi kone maualuga faia mai povi Angus Ausetalia maualuga. HACCP & USDA fa'amaonia e aunoa ma ni hormones po'o ni antibiotic.
corned-beef.keywords: povi kone, Ox & Palm, Pacific povi kone, mamoe kone, povi kone halal, povi kone fa'atau tele

fish-tuna.title: I'a ma Tuna - Susu, Fa'amalo & Tini | A & S Distributors
fish-tuna.description: I'a ma tuna lelei e aofia ai i'a susu Fiti (Kawa Kawa, Ulavi, I'a Polo), mackerel tini, tuna, ma sardines.
fish-tuna.pageDescription: Oloa i'a maualuga e aofia ai i'a susu Fiti ma ituaiga tini. Kawa Kawa, I'a Polo, mackerel i suau'u masani po'o tomato sauce, tuna, ma sardines.
fish-tuna.keywords: i'a Fiti, Kawa Kawa, mackerel tini, tuna tini, sardines, i'a Pasefika, i'a fa'atau tele, I'a Polo

canned-vegetables.title: Fualaau Tini - Susu Niu & Oloa Pasefika | A & S Distributors
canned-vegetables.description: Susu niu maualuga, kilimi niu, lau talo, ma fualaau Pasefika. Lelei mo mea'ai masani ma kare.
canned-vegetables.pageDescription: Susu niu ma kilimi suamalie mo mea'ai masani, supo, kare, sosi, mea suamalie ma mea inu. O se sui lelei mo susu povi.
canned-vegetables.keywords: susu niu, kilimi niu, lau talo, palusami, duruka, fualaau Pasefika, niu Fiti

ox-palm-corned-beef-7oz.name: Ox & Palm Povi Kone
ox-palm-corned-beef-7oz.description: Povi kone maualuga faia mai povi Angus Ausetalia maualuga. Sili atu le susu ma le tele o fasi nai lo isi povi kone i le maketi. HACCP & USDA fa'amaonia e aunoa ma ni hormones po'o ni antibiotic. Lelei mo hash povi kone, sanuisi, pasta, ma fuamoa.
ox-palm-corned-beef-7oz.seoTitle: Ox & Palm Povi Kone 7oz - Premium Ausetalia | A & S Distributors
ox-palm-corned-beef-7oz.seoDescription: Povi kone Ox & Palm maualuga mai povi Angus Ausetalia. USDA fa'amaonia, e leai ni hormones. Tau fa'atau tele e maua.
ox-palm-corned-beef-7oz.seoKeywords: Ox & Palm povi kone, povi kone Ausetalia, povi kone maualuga, povi kone fa'atau tele

contact.title: Fa'afeso'ota'i Mai
contact.description: Fa'afeso'ota'i le A & S Distributors. O lo o matou iinei e fesoasoani atu i ou mana'oga fa'atau mea'ai tele.
contact.seoDescription: Fa'afeso'ota'i le A & S Distributors mo fa'atau mea'ai Pasefika. Vala'au, imeli, po'o a'siai i lo matou nofoaga i Salida, CA.
contact.seoKeywords: fa'afeso'ota'i A & S Distributors, fa'atau mea'ai Pasefika, fa'atau mea'ai tele, oloa mea'ai Fiti, fa'atau mea'ai Kalefonia
